amendment.description: To require the Secretary of Defense to conduct a study on cyberexploitation of members of the Armed Forces and their families.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2287 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2287 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Sasse to Amendment SA 2301. (consideration: CR S4184; text: CR S4194) To require the Secretary of Defense to conduct a study on cyberexploitation of members of the Armed Forces and their families.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2287 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2287 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Sasse to Amendment SA 2301.
